dcterms:description: The BU3DFE database provides video of subjects displaying six basic facial expressions, with audio-video interleaved in AVI format. It includes 90 videos from different subjects, each showing sequences of facial expressions in frontal view, with approximately 100 frames per second and a resolution of 640 x 480.
dcterms:title: BU3DFE
